title: Docker
prerequisites: At least 1 year of experience in the software development world.
Bring your own computer where you rights to install new software.
objectives: Understand when Docker might not be the appropriate solution.
Be able to create basic Docker images.
Be able to run Docker containers
language: The course is given in Hebrew with slides and materials in English.

syllabus.title: Introduction to Docker
entries: How can Docker bridge the gap between Developers, QA, and Operations?

syllabus.title: Docker Basics
entries: Difference between a Docker Image and a Docker Container

syllabus.title: Building our first Docker container
entries: Accessing the disk on the host system.
Mapping ports of the Docker image and the local system.
